title: Medical Chinese Communication Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Chinese Conversational Skills and Foundational Knowledge of Medical Terminology
context.additional_context: Role-play-centered instruction using authentic clinical consultation materials based on Conversation Analysis (CA).

learning_goals: Learners can apply at least three CA (Communicative Accommodation)-based communication strategies to accurately gather patient information in clinical scenarios.
Learners can accurately use over 10 key expressions extracted from real clinical consultations in context-specific situations.
Learners achieve 80% or higher communication performance in three medical consultation scenarios—diagnostic explanation, treatment recommendation, and treatment planning—during role-play assessments.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
